a1: Sistema layout CSS unidimensionale per distribuire spazio e allineare items in container. Perfetto per navbar, card grids, centring.
a2: justify-content allinea lungo asse principale (orizzontale se row). align-items allinea lungo asse trasversale (verticale se row).
a3: Per layout verticali (stack). Inverte asse principale e trasversale. Utile per sidebar, mobile layouts.
q4: What is the difference between justify-content and align-items?
a4: justify-content controls alignment along the main axis (horizontal for row), while align-items controls alignment along the cross axis (vertical for row).
